other_tests.findings: Distended gallbladder with surrounding pericholecystic fluid. Gallbladder wall is edematous and minimally thickened at 4 mm. Some layering sludge noted within the gallbladder. No evidence for cholelithiasis. Normal liver echotexture without focal liver lesion. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Common bile duct measures 3 mm. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No evidence for ascites.
